name: Duel Soul
effect: Restores 34% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 980 HP every 5s for 30s.
description: Cyno's specialty. The golden grains of rice have been piled up like a most remarkable hill. As you scoop out a chunk and place the fragrant meat into your mouth, an impulse you cannot name rises within your chest â€” a desire to whip out your Genius Invokation deck and duel!
